flash compatible firmware
You can useÂ newflasherÂ tool from @munjeniÂ and use instructions there to flash the firmware.
The tool should skip dangerous .ta files automatically.Â You may consider removingÂ Just remove the persist_X-FLASH-ALL-42E5.sin file, which is discussedÂ hereÂ to avoid flashing it - as tested by @tanapoom1234, not flashing the persist partition allows to keep the Android Attest Key - check hisÂ post#212.Â /Added on 2019-04-06: The key is not part of TA obviously, it is present in the persist partition, so never flash persist even after TA backup./
